fastFoods.name: Fries
fastFoods.description: Crispy golden fries tossed with sea salt, served piping hot for the perfect snack or sidekick to any meal.

fastFoods.name: Onion Rings
fastFoods.description: Thick-cut onion rings fried to a crunchy perfection, served with a zesty, creamy dipping sauce.

fastFoods.name: Wegus Bites
fastFoods.description: Crispy-on-the-outside, tender-on-the-inside veggie nuggets infused with herbs and spices — a vegetarian's savory delight.

fastFoods.name: Garlic Breads
fastFoods.description: Freshly baked bread slices brushed with rich garlic butter and lightly toasted for an aromatic and crunchy treat.

fastFoods.name: Tacos
fastFoods.description: Soft-shell tacos filled with spicy grilled chicken, fresh veggies, and a creamy chili-lime dressing — bursting with bold flavor.

fastFoods.name: Shawarma
fastFoods.description: Tender, marinated meat carved fresh and wrapped in warm pita with garlic sauce, crisp veggies, and Middle Eastern spices.
